b: when told red then tell redon, tell yellowoff, tell greenoff
when told yellow then tell redoff, tell yellowon, tell greenoff
when told green then tell redoff, tell yellowoff, tell greenon
when told off then tell redoff, tell yellowoff, tell greenoff
when told on then tell redon, tell yellowon, tell greenon
when taken then is held
when shaken then is held
when let go then is not held
when trigger let go then is not triggered
when told travel then tell on
when starts then is addon
when told travel and is addon then emit gravity-free artscanner with 20
when told board and is addon then emit gravity-free boardscanner with 20
when told redon then become next in 0.5s
when told redoff then become previous in 0.5s
when told yellowon then become next in 0.5s
when told yellowoff then become previous in 0.5s
when told greenon then become next in 0.5s
when told redoff then become previous in 0.5s
when touches hand and is held then become next in 0.2s
when touches hand and is not addon and is held then play digital explosion
when starts then tell travel, become previous in 0.2s
when starts then is zoom
when starts then turn collidable, turn sub-thing uncollidable
when told travel and is addon then become untweened next
when touches artscanner then tell travel
when touches boardscanner then tell board
when starts then become untweened previous in 0.5s
when starts then turn uncollidable, turn subthing on
when triggered then is triggered, become next in 1s, tell red, say 3
when starts and is triggered then become next in 1s, tell yellow, say 2
when starts and is not triggered then become untweened 1, tell off
when starts and is triggered then become next in 1s, tell green, say 1
when starts and is not triggered then become untweened 1, tell off
when starts and is triggered then become next in 1s, tell on, say go
when starts and is not triggered then become untweened 1, tell off
when starts then tell travel, is zoom
